osc.description: OSC/UDP server for receiving Mind Monitor messages

data_collection.description: ML training data collection. Enable with --collect flag.

notes.setup: Configure Mind Monitor to send OSC to this Mac's local IP (e.g., 192.168.1.100:5000)
notes.usage: Run with ./run.sh to start server with caffeinate (prevents Mac sleep)
notes.data_collection: Use ./run.sh --collect to enable EEG/ACC/GYRO recording for ML training
